content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, thank you for your interest in my apartment in Munich. I'm glad you want to negotiate the rental price with me. Based on the square footage of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This is a fair market rate based on current prices in the area, and I believe it reflects the value of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
I will sign the lease agreement tomorrow.
TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Mr. Trabelsi. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I look forward to seeing you tomorrow to sign the lease agreement. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sorry, I didn't mean to terminate. I just wanted to end the conversation.
I will sign the lease agreement tomorrow.
Thank you for your understanding.
TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: No problem at all, Mr. Trabelsi. I understand that you just wanted to end the conversation. Thank you for your prompt response and for signing the lease agreement tomorrow. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
